___inlineStyle.description: Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

___prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

___inlineTemplate.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

___stateInterface.description: Specifies the interface for the state.

___flat.description: Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

___state.description: Specifies the path to the state exports.

___styleext.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

___module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

___export.description: Specifies if declaring module exports the component.
